channel.title: How to make lvls for thieving a sort of stall?
channel.description:
[s]Hi, I've added some stalls in pimpscape and if i steal them i get 1M.. I want to make that much lower, does anyone know how?
Thank You Very Much
Greetings, Forca[/s]
[s]Hi, I know now how to edit the stall prices, but in that case i see: case 635: TheifStall(".", ".", 1, 5*playerLevel[17], 995, 2500, 30, 0x340); break;
i think i get 2500gp from "all" stalls now, how do i add new ones?[/s]
Hi, i know now how to make more stalls to steal from. I need to know now how i make Level Requirements. Post it if you can help me :)
Thank You Very Much
Greetings, Forca

item.title: How to make lvls for thieving a sort of stall?
item.dc:creator: @I_Forca_I I Forca I
item.description:
@I_Forca_I wrote:

Oh ok Thanks! Would’ve repped you if i was in to

EDIT: you will also need to make global objects for the new stalls (fedexers tuts)
Already have that :')

Read full topic
item.source: How to make lvls for thieving a sort of stall?

item.title: How to make lvls for thieving a sort of stall?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“I Forca I, post:4, topic:103942”][quote author=invalid name link=topic=148675.msg1411176#msg1411176 date=1180720099]
yes i know how , what does your stealing from stall code look like?
[/quote]

That’s my problem lol
I just added a stall, tried to steal from it and got 1M so i think it already was in pimpscape

[quote]just put into your client.java ctrl and f

find
995, 1000000

then change to to anythink you want basicly lol[/quote]

Lets try it

EDIT: Worked Thanks, but how to add new stalls?

Well, this is the code now and i think it is for all stalls i guess…

case 635:
TheifStall(".", “.”, 1, 5*playerLevel[17], 995, 2500, 30, 0x340);
break;[/quote]

find the id of the stall you want to add and make a new case.

like this

case ID: TheifStall(".", ".", 1, 5*playerLevel[17], 995, 2500, 30, 0x340); break;

EDIT: you will also need to make global objects for the new stalls (fedexers tuts)

Read full topic
item.source: How to make lvls for thieving a sort of stall?
